name: anxietyapp
description: set up npm init creates our package.json npm install parcel-bundler npm install --save firebase npm install bootstrap jquery popper.js in the package.json add a script start": "parcel index.html" install the linter: npm install eslint --save-dev configure the linter: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --init to run the server from terminal: npm start create a config file for Firebase credentials
